mapper.select: SELECT b.supervisorId,b.totalPrice,b.deptName,b.city,b.area,b.county,(@i:=@i+1) AS deptRank FROM ( SELECT ts.supervisorId, SUM(t.orderPrice) AS totalPrice, ss.city,ss.area,ss.county,cd.deptName FROM t_order t LEFT JOIN t_store ts ON t.userId = ts.userId LEFT JOIN sys_supervisor ss ON ss.supervisorId = ts.supervisorId LEFT JOIN c_dept cd ON cd.deptId=ss.deptId WHERE t.`status` = 1 AND ts.`status` = 1 AND ss.deptId =(SELECT deptId FROM sys_user WHERE userId=#{relationMap.userId}) GROUP BY ts.supervisorId ORDER BY totalPrice DESC ) AS b,(select @i:=0) as it
